0x586F80FF.name: GET_PLAYER_FOCUS_POS

params.name: playerSrc
params.description: The player to get the focus position of

0x586F80FF.description: Gets the focus position (i.e. the position of the active camera in the game world) of a player.
0x586F80FF.resultsDescription: Returns a `Vector3` containing the focus position of the player.
